org.jclouds.abiquo.features

Interface AdminAsyncApi


  • public interface AdminAsyncApi
    Provides asynchronous access to Abiquo Admin API.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat
    See Also:
    http://community.abiquo.com/display/ABI20/API+Reference, AdminApi
